# Interview Cracker App - Development Guide

This is a React 19 application with Tailwind CSS designed for interview preparation and practice.

## Project Overview
- **Framework**: React 19 with Vite for optimal performance
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS v3 with custom dark theme
- **Language**: TypeScript for type safety
- **Purpose**: Comprehensive interview practice platform for software developers

## Key Features
- AI-powered mock interview simulator
- Extensive question bank with filtering and search
- Multiple developer role support (Frontend, Backend, Full-stack, etc.)
- Real-time feedback and performance analytics
- Modern dark theme with smooth animations

## Architecture Guidelines
- Component-based architecture with clear separation of concerns
- Custom Tailwind utilities for consistent theming
- TypeScript interfaces for type safety
- Responsive design mobile-first approach
- Modern React patterns (hooks, context, suspense)

## Development Standards
- Use functional components with hooks
- Implement proper TypeScript typing
- Maintain consistent dark theme design
- Follow Tailwind utility-first approach
- Keep components modular and reusable
- Use semantic HTML and accessibility best practices

## Styling Conventions
- Custom color palette with dark theme variants
- Consistent spacing and typography scale
- Smooth transitions and hover effects
- Glass morphism and gradient effects
- Responsive breakpoints for all screen sizes
